comment: She is really nice and easy to talk to. She offers help and is willing to answer questions if you ask. She doesn't just give you the answers, she allow you to figure the problem out with her guidance. She know that her accent is hard for some to understand so she repeats what she says multiple times so everyone can understand.

Would not recommend at all. I had her for lab only (made a B in lecture with another professor) and she was very rude and short when I asked her questions. She would "review" our lab notebooks before we turned them in and had us fix some things but then when she went to grade them she would count off on stuff she told us was right.

Extremely hard to understand. Lectures are hard to follow because of language barrier. Extremely tough grader and takes off for small errors on labs. BEWARE of signficant figures. Definitely the worst professor I had this semester, simply because of the way she grades and the language barrier. Hard to approach but will help if needed.

Communication barrier: She's a perfectionist while grading labs, very unclear and has a severe attitude. Doesn't correlate with the Lecture Prof's to parallel our labs with our lectures and what we're learning and what we're not. DO HOURS OF WORK and you'll walk with a C. IT IS WHAT IT IS. I got straight A's in all my other classes:: Sooo..?

she goes over stuff during lab to help you fill out the lab reports if you havent already learned it in lecture... shes really easy going and reminds you if you're doing something wrong. definitely makes you work for your grade, but will guide you if you have questions

I like Prof Kaur, she will help if you ask detailed questions, but wants you to draw your own conclusions so you learn. My only issue is my chem lecture (w differ teacher) didn't keep up w lab, so its harder to do well in lab; had to study extra hard for online wksheets in lab. pay attention to sigfigs in lab, units rounding usually 0.0 or 0.5

She comes across really nice and easy at first, and she is nice, but she's confusing and grades pretty tough. Definitely harder than my friends' lab professors for the same class, and not because I'm really learning more. It feels unnecessarily complicated.
Organized professor. A lot of rules-proper attire, not being late, etc she has to follow b/c of dangers of chemicals. Drops lowest lab and lowest content assessment.
